title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item remains visible in the generated PDF.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be invisible or hidden in the generated PDF.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'Properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new PDF emitter.
5. View the PDF and observe the visibility of the label.
